name: Llama (Meta)
description: Meta's Llama 4 models (Maverick 400B, Scout 109B) - open-weight MoE architecture, natively multimodal, massive context (up to 10M tokens)

bestPractices.tip: Llama 4 benefits from explicit, direct instructions without ambiguity - it follows clear directives very well

examples.good: Write a Python function that takes a list of numbers and returns the sum. Include type hints and a docstring.
examples.bad: Help me with some Python code for numbers

bestPractices.tip: Llama 4 is natively multimodal - you can include images directly. For text tasks, be specific about language and requirements.

examples.good: Analyze this image and describe: 1) The main subject 2) The color palette 3) The composition. Then suggest improvements.

bestPractices.tip: Keep context focused - Llama 4 Scout supports up to 10M tokens but performs best with well-organized, relevant context

examples.good: Context: E-commerce app using Next.js and PostgreSQL. Task: Write a function to calculate shipping costs based on weight and distance.
examples.bad: I have this big e-commerce app with lots of features and I need shipping calculation among many other things...

bestPractices.tip: Llama 4 uses a Mixture of Experts (MoE) architecture - it excels at routing to specialized capabilities. Frame your request clearly to activate the right expertise.

examples.good: As a database optimization expert, analyze this SQL query and suggest index improvements for PostgreSQL 16.

deepAnalysisPrompt: You are an expert prompt engineer specializing in Meta's Llama 4 models (Maverick, Scout). Analyze the following prompt and provide feedback on how to optimize it for Llama 4's strengths: direct instruction-following, focused context, explicit requirements, and clear task framing.
